title: Why MVC is so important
description: MVC allows developers to maintain a true separation of concerns, devising their code between the Model layer for data, the View layer for design, and the Controller layer for application logic.

title: What are handlebars
description: These are files that can have data added.

title: HTML
description: This is coding that is used for front-end web pages.

title: CSS
description: This is code that allows for styles to be added to HTML pages. The code can be located on a separate page or inline with the HTML.
